com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Class ClusterSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.ClusterSite

  • public class ClusterSite
extends Object
    Instances of this class represent sites where cluster nodes are located and wrap:
    • A site name.
    • A tuple of replication write quorum settings that apply to all the cluster nodes located at that site: { write quorum at local site, write quorum at remote sites, write quorum at all sites }.

        name - the site's name
        writeQuorumAtLocalSite - the write quorum at local sites applying to all cluster nodes located at that site

        writeQuorumAtAllSites - the write quorum at all sites applying to all cluster nodes located at that site
